alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 7:21PM CDT until August 06 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... North central Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 721 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Midland City, or 10 miles northwest of Headland, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Headland, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Newville, Haleburg, Sylvan Grove, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Blackwood, Sigma, Grandberry Crossroads, Pleasant Plains, Browns Crossroads, Goldberg Field, Headland Municipal A/P and Balkum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
